sentences.sContent: He kissed the top of her head.
Alan fell asleep as soon as he put his head on the pillow.
sentences.sCn: 艾伦头一挨枕头就睡着了。

sentences.sContent: They dived head first into the water.
She was dressed in black from head to foot (= over all her body ).
sentences.sCn: 她从头到脚穿了一身黑。

sentences.sContent: He still has a full head of hair (= has all his hair, even though he is getting rather old ).

synos.tran: [解剖]头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力

在…的最前面；获最多的选票；在…的前面
头向外；出海；片头就位，片头朝外
领先；抢先起步的优势；有利的开端

words.tran: 兴奋的；任性的；性急的；顽固的；使人头晕的

trans.tranCn: 头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力
trans.tranOther: the top part of your body that has your face at the front and is supported by your neck
